commit message: Fix StringIndexOutOfBounds Exception when title is null
Possible fix to a NullPointerException that i can't reproduce but is on the Developer Console
Check if fragment is attached to activity on API callbacks, to prevent crashes.

Merge pull request #2 from KowalskiOmniROM/patch-1

French translation
New actions to clean/update the audio/video libraries
Show character avatar in remote posters when there's no image.
Automatically expand the first season that has unwatched episodes.

Merge pull request #3 from KowalskiOmniROM/patch-2

New strings translated to French
Fix crash when selecting dividers on the Nav Drawer
Added support for ToggleFullScreen. Using Input.ExecuteAction instead of GUI.SetFullscreen because the later doesn't work.
